text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Fans
text_block_list.text: TIC-KE-ZO! TIC-KE-ZO!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The ecstatic chants of the new<n>champion's name ring out
toward the<n>track.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hah! You hearing this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I expected no less. That was an<n>outstanding Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Aaah... The Derby! I won the... I won<n>the...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez, you beat me fair and square.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It was the only possible path. Yours<n>was truly the road to
victory.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin! Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That was the best race... The best<n>Derby ever! And it was
ours!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But it won't go this way next time. In<n>the Kikuka Sho, it'll be
my turn to win.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, our goal isn't just the Derby.<n>There's still plenty of
races to go.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Totally! And we'll run them all<n>together! Let's go for it! To
what's<n>beyond the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The cheers for Winning Ticket from<n>outside can be heard
through the<n>whole length of the runners' tunnel.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
That's quite a chant. You can hear it<n>across the entire
racetrack.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I think Tickezo's enthusiasm may<n>have spread to all her
fans.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, Traineeer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I did it! I won the Derby! It feels like<n>I'm dreaming!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations, Winning Ticket.<n>Hehe, are you sure you
didn't want to<n>take in more of that applause?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe, sure, but there's interviews to<n>do.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And, you know, this won't be the last<n>I hear it. There's
gonna be tons of<n>chances in the future!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Yes. She fulfilled her dream of<n>conquering the Derby, but
this isn't<n>the end.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Because her story will go on.
choice_data_list: Make them chant your name again and again!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Let's make it happen together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
All right, Ms. Tazuna! Let's get to<n>those interviews! I gotta
make up for<n>missing the prerace press<n>conference!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
And now, the racer who won the<n>Derby in spectacular
fashion—please<n>welcome Winning Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heehee, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
First, hearing the audience chant your<n>name after the
race—how did it make<n>you feel?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I gave my all to make this the best<n>Derby ever, so I was
really happy that<n>everyone watching picked up on it!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text:
You raced against your BNW rivals<n>today. What was the key
to your<n>victory?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I trained a whole lot, for sure, but<n>what really motivated me...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Was my dream of winning the Derby,<n>and the promise I
made with my<n>bestie rivals. That, and...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I really wanted to make my trainer a<n>Derby trainer for being
so supportive<n>all this time!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: One last thing. A message from the<n>Derby winner!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
My name's Winning Ticket, and I'm<n>the winner of the
greatest Derby ever!
